summary.para: Describes the strategy that the Overlay Mixer Filter filter uses to scale the video image down to a smaller size.
Decimate the video by taking the following steps, in the order listed, until one of them succeeds.

item.description: Try to use the overlay scaler on the VGA chip.
If the Overlay Mixer is connected through a video port, try to use the scaler on the video port.

summary.para: Decimate using the scaler on the video decoder. If that fails, crop the video image.
